column5: Nestled in the heart of Houston! 5.8 miles to NRG, 13.3 miles to Downtown, 7.4 miles to the Galleria area, 10.6 miles to the Museum District. My home is a cozy place for you to rest after an adventurous day in Houston.  My home is open to world travelers, weekend wanders, and stay-cation escapees. I have a host of suggestions and travelers advice if you need any just let me know!
column8: Great Houston APT Nestled in the Heart of Houston!
